advancements.gensokyolegacy.main.lost_memories.description: 露米娅受到40点以上的伤害时会变化为Ex露米娅。用弹幕击败Ex露米娅并获得露米娅的发带

advancements.gensokyolegacy.main.trade_danmaku.title: 可口的交易
advancements.gensokyolegacy.main.feed_reimu.description: 投喂灵梦妖怪归家中所有正常的食物，灵梦会给你她的大蝴蝶结作为谢礼
advancements.gensokyolegacy.main.feed_reimu.title: 满足的灵梦
